item.title: GPG + SSH ?
item.description:
This will be a small walk through on how to generate an authentication subkey on GPG and integrated with ssh. First of all bare in mind that will need a GPG key first in order to generate this subkey, if have not generated on yet refer to part 0 of these series.

Authentication Key

In order to generate an authentication key, as I mentioned before, you will need to have a key generated. Let’s check that with

item.title: Getting started with GnuPG
item.description: GnuPG is a complete and free implementation of the OpenPGP standard and this is just part 0 of who knows how many series where I will explain my basic understanding of GPG and how useful is on my daily basis. If you wish to understand more in detail how GPG work please refer to the RFC or here is a great post that captures the essence of it quite deeply.
